original_definition: 'consumption schedule' means a schedule representing the consumption of a demand facility or of a group of demand facilities;
generated_definition: 'consumption schedule' means a schedule determining when and how electricity is consumed, submitted to the tso for planning purposes.

Article 3: ‘consumption schedule’ means a schedule representing the consumption of a demand facility or of a group of demand facilities;
Article 92: 5.   When generation schedules and consumption schedules are submitted to the TSO pursuant to Article 111, the time resolution of the availability statuses shall be consistent with those schedules.
5.   Whengeneration schedules andconsumption schedules are submitted to the TSO pursuant to Article 111, the time resolution of theavailability statuses shall be consistent with those schedules.
